review: Fast, great quality video and audio, tiny... What more could you ask for? Great access to apps and services, we have one on each tv in the house and one at the office. Amazon hit a home run with this!
author: Aaron

review: I love it.  It does exactly what you said it would do.  And it was so easy to install.  Thank you
